caption: Great food and very clean place. The portion is very big as well and the meal is prepared in a good way. Not oil-y or heavy, amazing experience.
Delicious food, super clean fast food restaurant, very good packing for delivery orders. They have a good selection of menu, I tried gyros, it was so good.
Excellent food and stellar customer service!

HOW did I not order from this restaurant?! The food is tasty, and it’s halal! I always walked past it, and today I decide to order some food... Ya lahwiiii, that’s some good food hahah! Will be trying more from them
(Translated by Google) Excellent food, good service, good cleanliness.  (Original) Excelente comida, buen servicio, buena limpieza.
Very friendly staff and excellent food for low price. I am addicted to shrimp dishes and best burger I have tried!

(Translated by Google) No one wears a mask when entering they do not take the appropriate measures ... the manager should take the appropriate measures ... and take care of the health of the clients ...  (Original) Nadie usa mascarilla al entrar no toman las medidas adecuadas... el encargado debería tomar las medidas debidas.... y cuidar de la salud de los clientes..por el covid19

I was at DC last week with my family and was looking for a good fast food restaurant so I came across New York Grill. The restaurant was amazing. We loved the food. It was fresh and tasty. The meal size is big enough and prices are reasonable. The restaurant is super clean and the employees are very polite. I would definitely visit this place again and would highly recommend it to other customers.

Came in here on a whim and I'm so glad I did. I've had their fish a couple times and chicken-- both amazing. Chickpeas are perfect amount of spice. I'm gonna be working my way through their menu because I can't believe how good everything has tasted so far.

For anyone wondering if it's related to the amazing Arlington area food truck, it is -- same ownership and same delicious halal food.  Great prices, great staff, and most importantly great flavors. Personal favorite is the lamb over rice. Stop in and try it out. Cannot recommend it enough!
Solid halal at a reasonable price. I’ve had both the chicken and lamb and both were good. The staff is also friendly and helpful. Welcome addition to the neighborhood.

“Excellent environment, friendly service, great menu choices and really decent food and at affordable prices we had no idea what to expect, it was absolutely lovely. Friendly, efficient staff and the best food I’ve had in a very long time, cannot recommend this restaurant enough. “
